author: barnabasbusa
content:
Verkle-gen (starting from a verkle genesis) devnet 5 has launched today.

https://verkle-gen-devnet-5.ethpandaops.io

Any EL dev, if you have a client that you would like to test if it can sync, please check out the devnet spec at https://notes.ethereum.org/@ethpandaops/verkle-gen-devnet-5.

Currently onboarded clients:

* geth <> lighthouse
* geth <> lodestar
* geth <> teku

Single line kurtosis test also available at (to sync up to devnet 5):
`kurtosis run github.com/kurtosis-tech/ethereum-package@bbusa/verkle-archive --args-file https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kurtosis-tech/ethereum-package/bbusa/verkle-archive/.github/tests/verkle-gen-devnet-5.yaml`

or to start a brand new devnet with verkle genesis:
`kurtosis run github.com/kurtosis-tech/ethereum-package@bbusa/verkle-archive --args-file https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kurtosis-tech/ethereum-package/bbusa/verkle-archive/.github/tests/verkle-gen.yaml`

author: barnabasbusa
content:
Minimal build spec seems to be supported by all clients. Minimal build spec configuration has now been added to kurtosis, so anyone is free to try it. (Most clients require a new docker image!)
Example of minimal config can be found here: https://github.com/kurtosis-tech/ethereum-package/blob/main/.github/tests/minimal.yaml
